text: aur khuda hee vah (qaadir va tavaana) hai jo havaon ko bhejata hai to havaen baadalon ko udae-udae phiratee hai phir ham us baadal ko murda (ufataada) shahar kee taraph haka dete hain phir ham usake zarie se zameen ko usake mar jaane ke baad shaadaab kar dete hain yoon hee (murdon ko qayaamat mein jee uthana hoga)
